nodes.text: The Juvaini was an Imperial EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate.
Whilst being aided by the Metternich, the Imperial frigate attacked the Maria which was receiving B-wing starfighter prototypes.
The Juvaini was near Sunaj IV en route to a scheduled meeting with the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Relentless when the Nebulon-B was intercepted by starfighters of the Rebel Alliance.
Three Rebel B-wings from Blue group then proceeded to destroy the Juvaini swiftly before the Relentless could arrive at the scene to assist the doomed escort frigate.[source?]
